page.title: 19A survey of Parents' Jobs .
page.content: We asked all the pupils at school where their parents worked and these are our findings .Most dads work on farms then the next most popular type of work is in factories .Most Mums work, only about a third do not go out to work.Mums mostly work as cleaners in local houses or the Rose and Crown Hotel.When we asked how far Dads travelled to work we found that 10 out of 25 work within a mile of Ashbury . 5 Dads travel about 9 miles to Swindon and 4 work in Lambourn ,6 miles away. Two Dads travel very far one travels to Winchester and the other to Stanlake in southern England .It is interesting that we have one race horse trainer as a parent .
